meanings.sent1: The soldiers gathered their weaponry before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: The country invested heavily in its military weaponry.
meanings.sent3: The display of toy weaponry in the store made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit was her weaponry in any argument.
meanings.sent5: The arsenal of weaponry at the museum was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The study or use of weapons.
meanings.sent1: Learning about ancient weaponry is fascinating.
meanings.sent2: His expertise in weaponry made him a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent3: The professor's lecture on weaponry was surprisingly engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of weaponry was unmatched in the field.
meanings.sent5: The course on weaponry covered a wide range of historical tools.
